string-array.name: question
string-array.item: Which of the following is not a programming language? ,Java,PHP,Python,Html,Html
Which of the following is not a RDBMS? ,MS,SQL,Oracle,MongoDB,MySql,MongoDB
Which of the following is not an OS? ,Windows,Linux,Ubuntu,Word,Word
Which of the following is not a country? ,Nepal,India,China,Kanpur,Kanpur
What is the height of Mount Everest? ,8848 metres,8849 metres,8847 metres,8088 metres,8848 metres
What is the capital of Nepal? Kathmandu,Belgium,New Delhi,Seoul,Kathmandu
A source program is the program written in which level language? ,English,Symbolic,High-Level,Machine
Which has the maximum capacity? ,Floppy Disk,Zip Disk,Super Disk,Jaz-catridge,Jaz-catridge
The time for which a peace of equipment operation is called? ,Seek Time,effective time,access,real time,effective time
Which of the following is generally used for back-up? ,CD-ROM,Hard disk,Floppy disk,Magnetic tape,Magenetic Tape
